alert.note: Alert for Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Baker and south central Charlton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Taylor to near Sanderson. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. Strong ouflow winds will precede this line of thunderstorms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Taylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
